title: Identify this font please!
content:
Hi - This font seems like Peignot but the "S" in VERSACE is different. I am assuming this must be a bespoke font, but if there's something similar out there please could you help me identify it?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [GIANNI VERSACE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012635/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-31%20at%2016.49.35.png) | 73.98 KB |
author: AndreanaP

comments.content: Try URW++ or RR versions of [Radiant](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012635/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/radiant).
